1.「……そいつが お前の元相棒 キッズか。| ようやく バトルマスターになる| 決: So that's your former partner, Fry. I see|you've finally decided to become a|battlemaster. Fabel.

2.「これから先 剣の修行は 過酷になる。| まもの使いに未練を残したまま| 生半可:
From now on, sword training will be severe. I|don't want you to continue with a half-hearted|attitude while you have unfinished business|
|with a Monster Master.

3.「こいつは オレが 野に帰しといてやる。| さあ キッズを こっちによこしな！: I'll send him back to the field. Come on, Fry,|let's go!

4.「なぜ そこまで キッズに固執する？| こいつは 父親を襲った魔物なんだろ？: Why are you so obsessed with Fry? He's the|monster that attacked your father, isn't he?

6.「……わかったよ。オレ 覚悟を決める。: All right. I'll make up my mind.

7.「でも キッズは オレの手で 野に帰すよ。| そこまでしないと 未練なんか| 断: But I'm going to let Fry go back to the field.|If I don't do that, I don't think I'll be able|to cut off any lingering feelings.

8.「やめときな。自分で 手放そうとすると| 情に ほだされて せっかくの決心が……: Don't do it. If you try to let go, you'll fall|prey to your emotions.

9.「……仕方がない。お前の好きにしろ。: ...I don't have a choice. Do what you want.

10.「そんな所で 何してるのさ？| また 母さんに 何か頼まれたのか？: What are you doing out here? Did Mom ask you|to do something for me again?

11.「……ふぅん。まもの使い宛てに来た 仕事の話を| レンドアの町長の所へ 聞きにい: Hmm. I'm going to ask the mayor of Lendor|about a job that was sent to me by a Monster|Master... Is that how it's supposed to be?

13.「よし。オレも その仕事に付き合うよ。: All right. I'll go along with the job.

14.「まもの使いの仕事を 目に焼き付けて……| それで 決めたいんだ。: I want to see the work of a Monster Master|with my own eyes... and then I'll make up my|mind.

15.「アンタの後ろから 適当に ついていくし。| オレのことは 気にしないで| 目的: I'll just follow along behind you. Don't worry|about me, just go to your destination.

16.「じゃ。よろしくな。: Well then. Nice to meet you.

17.「どうだい <pc>さん？| 怪しい鳥の魔物は 見つかった？: How's it going, <pc>? Did you find|the weird bird monster?

18.「へへ。オレも シガールのオッサンから| 話を聞きだして 駆けつけたんだ。| で: Heh. I heard from Sigal's old man, too, and|came running. But from the looks of it, it|looks like he's not ready yet.

19.「それじゃ 鳥魔物が現れるかどうか| ここで しばらく 様子を見るとするか。: Well then, let's wait here for a while to see|if the bird monster will appear.

20.「……オレ デイラーさんに言われたんだ。| バトルマスターになるためには| まも: Dailer told me that in order to become a|battlemaster, I have to break off my|attachment to being a Monster Master.

21.「そのためには キッズを 野に帰せって……。| だから 最後に まもの使いのアン:
To do that, he wanted me to return Fry to the|field... So I wanted to travel with you, the|Monster Master, one last time to see what was|
|in my heart.

22.「本当に まもの使いを あきらめて| このまま バトルマスターになっていいのか。: Can I really give up on being a Monster Master|and become a battle master like this? Or...

25.「怪しい鳥魔物って アイツだよな……。| 確かに あんな色の ひくいどり| オレ: That's the weird bird monster, isn't it...|I've certainly never seen a Firebird of that|color before.

26.「後を追ってみようぜ <pc>さん！| ヤツが飛んでった 北東の方角には| たし: Let's go after him. There's supposed to be a|hole in the ground to the northeast of where|he flew over, called Nagiri Cave!

27.「オレたちは 先に ナギリ洞に行ってるぜ！| いいか？ ナギリ洞だぞ 忘れんなよ: We're going to Nagiri Cave first! Okay? Don't|forget Nagiri Cave!

29.「……商品ナンバー１３も だいぶ| オレたちの言うことを 聞くようになったな。: ...Item Number 13 is starting to listen to us|a lot more now.

30.「ブヒヒ。ここまで長かったもんね。| レンドア島に 行って帰ってを| 何回 繰り: Boo-hoo. It's been a long time since we got|here. I can't tell you how many times I've had|to go to Lendor Island and back.

31.「だが その甲斐あって 商品ナンバー１３は| 切り込み部隊として 使えるまでにな: But it all paid off, as Item Number 13 became|a useful incision unit...

32.「さあて いよいよだ。 | 後は おかしらが 最強の兵器となる獲物を| 手に入れ: Now it's time. All that's left to do is to|execute when Okasara receives the most|powerful weapon of them all.

33.「オレたち 魔物商人の未来を決める| レンドア島壊滅作戦をな……！: The future of the monster merchants depends on|the destruction of Lendor Island.

37.「ブヒヒ。なんだ こいつら？| まあ あの作戦のこと 聞かれちゃったからには|: Boo-hoo. What's with these guys? Well, now|that they've asked about the mission, we can't|let them leave alive, can we?

38.「そうだな。こいつらには 商品ナンバー１３の| 実戦訓練の相手にでも なってもら: I guess so. I'll have them train with Item|Number 13. Let's go, Charman!

40.「ブヒヒ。取り逃がしたかと思ったら| のこのこ そっちから来てくれるなんて| あ: Boo-hee. I'm so grateful that you're coming|over here just when I thought I'd missed it.

41.「レンドア島壊滅作戦のことを 知られた以上| 生かしておくわけには いかねえ。|: Now that they know about our mission to|destroy Lendor Island, we can't let them live.|Come on, Charman!

43.「クソッ！ なにもんだ てめえ……。| 魔物を操って 戦うのは| オレら魔物商人: Damn it! Who the hell do you think you are...|controlling and fighting monsters is the|exclusive domain of us monster merchants...

46.「デイラー……さん……？| どういうこと……？: Mr. Dailer...? What do you mean...?

47.「悪いが そういうことでね。| 旅のバトルマスターなんて デタラメ……。| オレ: I'm sorry, but that's what happened. The|traveling battlemasters are a bunch of hogwash|and I'm the master of them all.

48.「オレが お前に近づいた目的は ただひとつ。| そこにいる キッズを| お前から: I approached you for one reason only. It was|to take the Fry away from you.

49.「そんな……。それで <cs_pchero>さんや| オレの後を つけてきて こ: So you followed <cs_pchero> and me here...

50.「ふふ。お前んちの ばあさんは| 一流の まもの使いだったらしいじゃねえか。|: Hmmm. I heard that your grandmother was a|first-rate Monster Master. I can't mess with|someone like that.

51.「だから お前のトラウマを利用して| 平和的に キッズを手放してもらおうと| お: That's why he was using your trauma to get you|to let go of Fry peacefully.

52.「まあ 途中から ばあさん以外にも| ジャマなヤツが現れたがな。: Well, there were some other people besides|Granny who showed up along the way.

53.「さてと…… それじゃ ファーベル。| いい子だから キッズを オレに渡しな。: All right, well, Fabel. You're a good boy, so|give Fry to me.

54.「きたねえ……。| 誰が お前なんかに キッズを渡すもんか！: You're a creep... who's going to give Fry to|you?

55.「キッズ！ こんなヤツ| お前の炎で 丸コゲにしてやれ！: Fry! I want you to burn him to a crisp with|your flames!

60.「キッズ……。どうしたんだよ？| これじゃ まるで あの時と……| 父さんを襲っ: Fry... what's wrong with you? This is just|like that time... when you attacked my dad.

62.「ククク…… そうだ。| あの時 キッズを狂わせたのは このオレさ。: Kukuku... Yes, that's right. It was me who|drove Fry crazy that time.

63.「チャーマン！ トレダ！| そのドラゴンキッズを捕まえて 眠らせておけ！: Charman! Tred! Get that Small Fry and put him|to sleep!

66.「こいつは 魔物と まもの使いの絆を断ち切り| 野生に戻す粉。こうでもしないと:
This is a powder that breaks the bond between|monster and Monster Master and returns them to|the wild. If we don't do this, they won't|
|listen to us after we catch them.

67.「あの時も……お前らが来るのを 待ち伏せして| この粉をまいたんだ。お前の親父は:
That time too... we ambushed you and your|friends when you were coming and sprinkled|this powder on you. Your father was the first|
|to see what was going on.

68.「しかし お前の親父も アレだよな。| オレに気づいて 追ってこなけりゃ| 殺さ: But your father is like that too. He wouldn't|have been killed if he hadn't noticed me and|didn't come after me.

70.「おかげで こいつを手に入れるのに| ずいぶんと 苦労したぜ。: I had to work very hard to receive this guy.

71.「この 絶滅寸前の超希少種……| ゴールデンキングリザードの子供をな……。: This nearly extinct and extremely rare|species... the Golden King Lizard...

72.「じゃあな ファーベル。| お前のかわいいキッズが レンドア島を| 海に沈める日: So long, Fabel. Look forward to the day your|little Fry sinks Lendor Island in the sea!

74.「シガールのオッサンには オレが伝えとくよ。| このままじゃ レンドアが危ないっ: I'll tell Sigal's old man. Lendor's in danger.

75.「<cs_pchero>さんは 先に| 母さんのとこに 帰っててくれ。| 後から: <cs_pchero> go home to your mother first.|I'll be there later.

76.「ファーベル……。どうしたの あなた？| そんな所に突っ立って。| キッズは？: Fabel... what's the matter, honey? You're just|standing there. Where is Fry? Wasn't he with|you?

77.「母さん ばあちゃん 話があるんだ。| ……父さんのことで。: Mom, Grandma, I need to talk to you. It's...|it's about Dad.

78.「そんな……。デイラーさんが| あの人を殺した 犯人だったなんて……。: I can't believe... that Mr. Dailer was the one|who killed that man.

80.「ゴメン。ふたりとも……。| オレ なんにも知らずに あんなヤツを| うちに招き: I'm sorry. Both of you... I didn't know what I|was doing inviting that guy into our home...

81.「気にすることないわよ。| そんなの 私にも わからなかったし……。| あなたの: Don't worry about it. I didn't know that, and|I'm not going to judge you for it.

82.「あの……<pc>さん。今回は| 思いがけず うちのゴタゴタに巻き込んじゃって|: Um...<pc>. I'm sorry for the trouble|I've caused you this time by unexpectedly|involving you in our mess.

83.「せめてもの お詫びに| 何か お贈りしたいのですが…… 困ったわ。| いったい: I'd like to send you something as an apology,|but... I'm stumped. I don't know what in the|world would be appropriate...

84.「若いの。ちょっと こっちに来な。: Young man. Come here for a minute.

85.「これからの戦いに 必要じゃろう。| まもの使いの必殺技を| お前さんに 伝授し: You will need it for the coming battle. I will|teach you the special moves of a Monster|Master.

86.「まもの使いの必殺技……。それは素晴らしいわ。| おばあちゃん すみません。|: The special moves of a Monster Master...|That's brilliant. I'm sorry, Grandma. It's|just that I wasn't there.

87.「いくよ 若いの。| しっかり 目をつぶってな。: Here we go, young man. Keep your eyes closed.

88.メドウは 呪文を唱えはじめた。|<pc>は 目を閉じ|メドウの言葉に 耳をかたむ: Meadow began to chant a spell. <pc>|closed his eyes and listened to Meadow's|words...

89.「……と思うたが| お前さんは もう 必殺技を覚えてたか。| じゃあ これをやる: But you've already learned a special move,|haven't you? Then I'll give you this.

91.「……ひとりで 考えたいことがあるんだ。: I need to think about something alone.

92.「ハァ……。ムリもないわね。| 相棒だった キッズが| 悪者に利用されるかもしれ: Huh... that doesn't make any sense. I can't|believe that Fry, my partner, might be used by|the bad guys.

93.「でも <pc>さんのおかげで| 事前に 魔物商人たちの企みを| 知ることができ: But thanks to <pc> we were fortunate|to know in advance what the monster merchants|were up to.

94.「レンドア島壊滅なんて 本当に ゆるせない。| それだけは 絶対に 阻止しないと: The destruction of Lendor Island is truly|unforgivable. We have to make sure we don't|let that happen.

95.「……<pc>さん。| あなたに頼ってばかりで 申し訳ありませんが| その時は: ...<pc>. I'm sorry that I keep|relying on you, but if that's the case, please|lend me your help.

96.「ですが 相手も レンドア島の壊滅を企むような| 強敵です。ウデをみがき 時が来:
However, they are also a formidable foe,|plotting the destruction of Lendor Island.|Please improve your skills and lend me your|
|help again when the time comes.
